name: Amateur Florist
description:
WARNING: It's very rough in the visual department (and that's being generous), but the Gameplay loop is complete (I think). 

I'd love your feedback on the Gameplay!

This project is for me to practice a few things: Android environment, the use of ScriptableObjects and dabble in Pixel Art. 

I feel it's going well. You take care of plants and then sell them to a frantic slew of customers.
